Implement universal basic income: I would introduce a universal basic income program to ensure that everyone has access to a minimum standard of living, regardless of their employment status. This would help reduce poverty and inequality, and allow individuals to pursue their passions and contribute to society in their own unique ways.

Promote global education: I would work to provide access to quality education for all people around the world. This would include investing in teacher training, providing resources such as books and computers, and creating incentives for people to stay in school and pursue higher education.

Invest in infrastructure: I would invest in infrastructure projects such as roads, bridges, and public transportation systems. This would not only create jobs but also improve the quality of life for people around the world.

Foster international cooperation: I would work to foster greater international cooperation on issues such as climate change, economic development, and security. This would involve creating organizations such as the United Nations and working to build relationships between nations.

Encourage entrepreneurship: I would encourage entrepreneurship by providing resources such as funding, mentorship, and training to individuals who want to start their own businesses. This would help create jobs and drive economic growth.
